page.title: 14ATTITUDES OF ARBROATH KIDS 1
page.content: Most of the children that we surveyed said they spent most of their{ {recreation}time outdoors.Everybody said that they enjoyed living in the area but just over half complained that there was not enough to do.The most popular forms of{entertainment} were cycling,swimming(a fact which proved the popularity of the local swimming{club}),and playing records. From the answers given it was obvious that there was a wide variety of clubs which catered for children.Through local clubs children could enjoy tennis,football,gymnastics,athletics, golf,traditional Scottish dancing, badminton,squash,and cricket,as well as swimming.In addition there were youth clubs at which children could enjoy a number of activives.
